text: Peshtani is a village in Municipality of Prilep, North Macedonia. It used to be part of the former municipality of Vitolište. ==Demographics== According to the 2002 census, the village had a total of 20 inhabitants. Ethnic groups in the village include:Macedonian Census (2002), Book 5 - Total population according to the Ethnic Affiliation, Mother Tongue and Religion, The State Statistical Office, Skopje, 2002, p. 314. *Macedonians 20 ==References== Category:Villages in Prilep Municipality
title: Peštani, Prilep
